debates.showAs: Coroners (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Act of 1962, to provide for a verdict of Iatrogenic Suicide and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht 1962, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíorasc arb éard é Féinmharú Iatraigineach agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Health (Exemption of Charges for Involuntary Psychiatric Patients) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Act 1970 to exclude involuntarily detained psychiatric patients from any in-patient fees.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 1970 chun othair shíciatracha atá faoi choinneáil dá n-ainneoin a eisiamh ó aon táillí d’othair chónaithe.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Exemption of Charges for Involuntary Psychiatric Patients) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Díolúine ó Mhuirir d’Othair Shíciatracha Ainneonacha) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Mental Health (Capacity To Consent To Treatment) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Mental Health (Capacity to Consent to Treatment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the Mental Health Act 2001 and for that purpose to provide for the right of minors over the age of 16 to consent to mental health treatment and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Meabhair-Shláinte, 2001 agus chun na críche sin do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceart mionaoiseach atá os cionn 16 bliana d'aois toiliú le cóireáil mheabhairshláinte agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Mental Health (Capacity To Consent To Treatment) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Meabhair-Shláinte (Cumas Toiliú le Cóireáil), 2018

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: Second Stage
Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit conversion therapy, as a deceptive and harmful act or practice against a person's sexual orientation, gender identity and, or gender expression.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc teiripe thiontúcháin mar ghníomh nó cleachtas meabhlach agus dochrach in aghaidh gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht inscne agus/nó léiriú inscne duine.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Theiripí Tiontúcháin, 2018

debates.showAs: Arts (Dignity at Work) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the Arts Council to ensure that funding is contingent on compliance with employment law and for that purpose to amend the Arts Act 2003; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú don Chomhairle Ealaíon a chinntiú go mbeidh maoiniú ag brath ar an dlí fostaíochta a bheith á chomhlíonadh agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Ealaíon, 2003; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Ealaíon (Dínit ag an Obair) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2018

debates.showAs: National Asset Management Agency (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the National Asset Management Agency Act 2009 and the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 to empower NAMA and the Ireland Strategic Investment Fund to contribute to the stability of the housing system through the provision of social and affordable housing
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta fán nGníomhaireacht Náisiúnta um Bainistíocht Sócmhainní, 2009 agus an Achta um Ghníomhaireacht Bainistíochta an Chisteáin Náisiúnta (Leasú), 2014 chun a chumhachtú do GNBS agus don Chiste Infheistíochta Straitéisí d'Éirinn rannchuidiú le cobhsaíocht an chórais tithíochta trí thithíocht shóisialta agus incheannaithe a sholáthar
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fán nGníomhaireacht Náisiúnta um Bainistíocht Sócmhainní (Leasú) 2017

debates.showAs: Coroners (Amendment) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Coroners (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Act of 1962, to provide for a verdict of iatrogenic suicide andrelated matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht 1962, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíorasc arb éard é féinmharú iatraigineach agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2016: Restoration to Order Paper
Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2016: Order for Committee Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reduce to sixteen years the age at which a person is entitled to be registered as a European Parliament and Local Government elector, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do laghdú go dtí sé bliana déag an aois ag a mbeidh duine i dteideal a bheith cláraithe mar thoghthóir do Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus mar thoghthóir Rialtais Áitiúil, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Sentencing Council Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a Sentencing Council and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú Comhairle um Pianbhreith a Ghearradh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá Chomhairle um Pianbhreith a Ghearradh, 2015

debates.showAs: Referendum (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Referendum Act 1994 to provide for a timeframe within which the Courts must ordinarily hear and make a finding on a referendum petition and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht an Reifrinn, 1994 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le creat ama ar laistigh de a chaithfidh na Cúirteanna de ghnáth achainí reifrinn a éisteacht agus cinneadh a dhéanamh ina leith agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Coroners (Amendment) Bill 2015 [‘Jake’s Amendment’]: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Act of 1962 to provide for a verdict of Iatrogenic Suicide and related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht 1962 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíorasc arb éard é Féinmharú Iatraigineach agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Garda Síochána (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 to exempt charity events and local community based festivals and events from policing service charges and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú fhorálacha Acht an Gharda Síochána, 2005 chun imeachtaí carthanais agus féilte agus imeachtaí pobalbhunaithe áitiúla a dhíolmhú ó mhuirir seirbhíse póilíneachta agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2014: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Domestic Violence (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 1996 to provide protection to applicants who have been prohibited from availing of social housing by virtue of the applicant's legal or beneficial interest in the residence in which the applicant and respondent previously resided
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 1996, do thabhairt cosaint d'iarratasóirí atá toirmiscthe ar leas a bhaint as tithíocht shóisialta de bhua leas dlíthiúil nó tairbhiúil an iarratasóra san áit chónaithe ina raibh cónaí ar an iarratasóir agus ar an bhfreagróir roimhe sin

debates.showAs: Charities (Amendment) Bill 2014: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Charities (Amendment) Bill 2014 [Private Members]: Second Stage
Charities (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the full implementation of the unenacted provisions of the Charities Act 2009; to include the advancement of human rights as a charitable purpose and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun na forálacha neamhachtaithe den Acht Carthanas, 2009 a chur i ngníomh go hiomlán; d'áireamh chur chun cinn chearta an duine mar chríoch charthanúil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Equal Status (Amendment) Bill 2013: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Equal Status (Amendment) Bill 2013: Second Stage [Private Members]
Equal Status (Amendment) Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to promote equality in the functioning of public bodies, to provide that regard be had by public bodies to the desirability of reducing socio-economic and other inequalities, to provide for the carrying out of equality impact assessments in respect of measures that are likely to have a significant impact or effect on the equality of opportunity between persons, to provide for the administration by the equality authority of various matters pertaining to this Act, to amend the Equal Status Act 2000, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur an chomhionannais chun cinn i bhfeidhmiú comhlachtaí poiblí, do dhéanamh socrú chun go mbeidh aird ag comhlachtaí poiblí ar a inmhianaithe atá sé éagothromais socheacnamaíocha agus éagothromais eile a laghdú, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le measúnachtaí tionchair comhionannais a dhéanamh i leith beart ar dóigh tionchar suntasach a bheith acu nó éifeacht shuntasach a bheith leo ar chomhionannas deiseanna idir daoine, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir leis an Údarás Comhionannais do riar nithe éagsúla a bhaineann leis an Acht seo, do leasú an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Reform of Judicial Appointments Procedures Bill 2013: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Reform of Judicial Appointments Procedures Bill 2013: Second Stage [Private Members]
Reform of Judicial Appointments Procedures Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reform the way in which individuals are selected for appointments to the judiciary by the Judicial Appointments Board
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'athchóiriú na slí ina ndéantar pearsana aonair a roghnú le haghaidh ceapachán chun na breithiúnachta ag an mBord Comhairleach um Cheapacháin Bhreithiúnacha
bill.shortTitleEn: Reform of Judicial Appointments Procedures Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Nósanna Imeachta i ndáil le Ceapacháin Bhreithiúnacha a Athchóiriú, 2013
